Hey,
whats goin on everybody?
Nothin to much here. I havent updated in a while.. I am sorry, I've been kinda busy! lol I am soo excited we only have 25 more DAYS OF SCHOOL left!! whoot whoot!! LOL we are goin to be FRESHMEN! lol yessss But we still have the 8th grade formal to worry about ;-)..but that wont be so bad. DAMMIT I love you all soo much! god I really donno what I would do wit out you all! 

~To all my chickies- I LOVE YOU you all are the very best! you all KNOW who you are! :-) YALL MAKE ME LIVE!

~To all my guys- I love you all .. you dont help me a lot.. but some of you do .. and If I didnt have some of you .. I dont think I could make it through some of my days! YALL ARE WORTH LIVING!!!

well I am out for now.. OH YESS.. i need some help..

I am dieing my hair VERY SOON! and I need some help..

Should I.. 

1. GO darker

2. GO blonder

3. GO Red

4. GO black (or close to it)

those are your options.. Leave me a comment and tell me.. b.c i need some serious help!

~Love you all~

 -::Meg::-


<marquee> HAIR EMERGENCY!!! HELP!!! <marquee>

~hey sweeties I am sooo sorry i havent updated in a while.. I have been really busy, sick, and now I am broken again! yess I broke my foot! lol But hey thats me.. if I didn't have bad luck I wouldn't have luck at all!! lol ah this weekend should be interesting I have to go to my cuz (BILLY) gradutation at Michigan field! lol I am soo excited but it will be kinda a pain bein on cruches! lol yes well.. 

Chels~ you betta get betta soon cuz i dont want you sick! lol its not kewl!

yes well I am off I am goin to the store with my father and we are going to get me some more pain meds! lol they are fun.. but also helpful!

 DONT forget I always have my cell on.. and I am always here to talk! 

Love you all lots and lots

 -::-Meg-::-

<marquee> yaho0o0o.. I love you!! <marquee>

                                   -I love you all soo much!

Hey everybody whats goin on?.. nothin at all here.. I have just been sick all day! lol.. Grrr. I hate being sick.. 
well did I miss anything GOOD in school. lol. leave a comment if so. 
Omg I cant believe tomorrow is Friday.I dont know I might not be in school. I might still be sick. 
Chels you are leavin on monday I dont know what I am going to do without you. :-( I am going to miss you soo much.. even though its only a week.. lol. Are we still going to their game tomorrow? I hope! lol I wanna see my him and you can see John lol! 
well I am off.. Not feelin to hot!

Hey yall whats going on? nothin really much here. Just listenin to music and talkin. So how was everybodys break! lol Mine was kinda boaring. Didnt do much, but hey I had fun. Bein back to school kinda sucks! lol I just dont like all the homework!

~Chels~ I am going to miss you when you leave on monday! lol I know it is only for a week, but no talkin to you.. thats like HELL!! lol I will write you notes and just give them to you when you get back! lol I dont think you would get them if I sent them! lol Dont you LOVE my moped horn! lol I know its REALLY annoying! lol! well I will miss ya babe but thank god you arent goin till monday! lol lyl

~Tess-a-roo!!~ hey babe you know I am always here to help! lol we will pull through this!! lol ... p.s. WIGGLY GIGGLIE!! also he who shall not be named NEEDS a bra! lmfao

Well thouse are todays shout outs! 

This week should be very boaring, but I guess we can all look at it this way.. It is the middle of the week! lol yay! well tell me if you want to be in tomorrows shout outs! lol 
Love you all lots!

                    _-Meglynn-_

well now I am just listen to music and talkin to people.. 
Tomorrow is Valentines day and I cant talk to the one I love ... ::Tear Tear:: :'(
I hope you all have a good day though! As long as I talk to some of my friends I will be okay.. lol.. well I am going to go.. Movie time..

Meg

hey hotties..
whats goin on ? Nothin really much here I just got home from  shopping a lil while ago! lol I had fun! sry I haven't updated in wile but I have been kinda busy.. lol.
well yeah I am NOT going out with James just to clear that up!! lol.. The Dance was so fun.. I loved bein with *him*.. lol..
Well I am going to go .. phone is ringing and I am gunna watch a movie!
Leave a comment!!
*Meg

...xxxooo...

Chels ~ J.U.I.C.Y

oh yeah and I cant wait to hang out with one of my chicks tomorrow! you know who you are.. we are goin to rock the house! lol

<marquee> I love you *boy* so much it hurts... <marquee>

Hey hotties whats going on? *Nothin to much here just chillin at home.. alone once again! lol I am always alone now! but its ok.. so I a lot of people are going to the dance of Friday, I am going! lol The dances are like really corney but hey, it lets me hang out and just dance! lol * Is anybody gettin that*special someone* a valentines gift?? lol let me know if you are. I am just gettin James something simple, but I think he will like it! But I cant tell you ... you might tell him! sshhh! its a secret * Well I am off ... I am gunna maybe do some homework talk on da phone .. maybe to james !! ;-) lol gimmie a call anytime! xxxooo I love you all Meglynn <3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3 much love to all! I love you James..

Hey everybody todays the Super Bowl!! wooot wooot!! lol I want the Eagles to win it.. who do you want to win. (leave a comment) well I wont be able to see kik off b.c I have to go to the hospital ( to see my grandma) and then I am going to the movies! Daddy Daughter date!! yay! I love these! BUT I will be home for some of the game.. yall can call me during the game .. get some bets goin! lol thats what me and James do! lol its like not money or anything.. its like we have to do something! well I  Have to get goin.. Leave a comment and I will get back to you all for the game Resaults!! yay!!

GO EAGLES!!!

xxxooo Meglynn

<marquee> I love you all!! GO EAGLES!! call me <marquee>

*Hey Hotties!
Sorry I havent updated in a while.. I Have been a lil sick, And just havent wanted to go on the computer! So how was everybody week? mine was Okay I am just glade its ova! lol Now the Weekend baby! lol My Birthday is on Sunday! I cant wait! lol ... What have you all go plans for tomorrow?

*Tomorrow on my agenda is Goin to the Guys Hoops games with chels and maybe Heather! yay this should be fun fun fun! Lol yes chels you do need to get out of da house and I think lookin a *Guys* Playin Basketball is just what my chelsey needs! lol..

*Sunday should be a Fun Filled day.. My Bitchen Birthday! yay! I rock I will be 14!! lol Oh Yeah and Happy Birthday To Eric Martin too! lol We have da same Birthday babes .. WE ROCK!! lol but I am still a Year Older!!! haha! On my Birthday I am goin to be hangin out with chels.. my dad.. and probally Deborah!! lol.. Chels I cant wait too see whatcha got me! lol I know you just cant wait to give it to me lol.. I wanted to open it the otha night and you wanted me too too but DAMN those Parentals.. lol They wouldnt let us *Have Fun* lol..

*Well I am gunna Hit it... call me or leave a HAPPY BIRTHDAY comment!! lol I would Love that!

Love you all!

 xo.:Meg:.xo

hey Chickies and Hotties...
Nothin really here just in Spanish right now.. Boaring day.. as always!! Well it is not as boaring with my mandy here!! I love Mandy!! oh yeah and mandy if you are readin this we sooo hangin out soon! lol we can hang out with my pops!! lol.. call with plans babe..

This week should be fun I mean it is only a few days till my birthday.. YAY!! I just wanna chill with my chicks and dudes! thats all I want.. but maybe a lil something from my family!! lol... Damn I am so glade I dont have another soccer game for like a week! That means I can like relax for a while! No Work for me, well gym but o0o well..

The only thing that kinda sucks about this week.. is MEAP!! I mean I have it in algebra, science, and American History.. lol my only homework for three days in Algebra is get 8 hours of sleep!! lol yay! I Hate Algebra! I am getting a D.. oh well my dad just said do your best.. and that is the best I can do I guess... ;-)

Anybody got plans for this weekend?? If you dont maybe if you tell me we can chill!! lol I LOVE seein my friends around my birthday! Its the best! From my friends the only thing I want is like for 30 people to say happy birthday! lol because it is the date of my birthday.. but if not I wont be sad.. I will just hang out with the people that CARE!! lol jk I LOVE YOU ALL!!

LoL to Daryl- o me g .. lol I love you but DAMN.. she much have hit that pillow HARD!! lol ppuufftt! *Feathers Fly*

well I am out till tonight.. so leave a comment and I will get back to ya!

Love you all!!

xo.:Meg:.xo

<marquee> Hit that pillow hard!! ppuufftt! *Feathers Fly* <marquee>

hey everybody ,
Just as I thought it was a fuckin boaring day! lol Tomorrow wont be AS bad.. I am going to da *movies* with my dad!! lol daddy daughter date!! I love these!! I dont actually know what movie we are seein. But it should be fun! 

Hey maddie great talk we had! I am always here! did everybody have a good weekend? well there is still one more day...Well it is kinda late I am gunna go to bed.. all that talkin on the phone tired me out!! lol well leave me a comment and I will get back to ya!!

xo.:Meg:.xo

Just woke up and OMG... all this snow! Snowboard City!! lol.. Yeah that is what I am gunna try to do soon! Vicki you have to come with me! Master that Hill!! lol...Wonder how much snow is really out there? lol..Well I am not going to check when I am in my Pajamas.. lol a LIL ChIlLy! lol I have like no plans for this weekend. I think it is just one of those *blah* weekends. I do Really wanna go snowboarding, anyone up for it? Tell me if you are!! :-) 

This whole week went by so fast, dont ya think?!? well we didnt really have that much school! lol
I cant wait till my birthday I am not doin anything REALLY special.. But if you want to get together just to chill around my birthday just tell me and that would be a AWSOME gift!! lol

Also afta my Birthday is anyone up for a lil shopping? lol I am goin to have a lot of Mula cha cha!! lol and I  WANT to go shopping! lol so If you wanna come, let me know and we SURE WILL GO!! ;-) I refuse to go with my dad he dose not have any taste! lol jk I would just rather just chill with my friends at the mall *boy hunting* well all know we do it.. and like when we see a *hot guy* we go into the same store they do or we just kinda stand there and look kinda dumb!! lol I know me and my Chicks do that! lol

Well I am off to watch some sports, I dont know what kinda, arent there like some *Football* games today?? lol tell me so I know so I am not like Channel Surfing all day! lol 

Dont forget you all can call me anytime, just to chat, Or just with plans!! lol 

Luv you all a LOT!!

~Meg
